dmca.title: [TP-C579556J] DMCA / Breach of Copyright
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, August 23, 2006 5:33 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C579556J] DMCA / Breach of Copyright Subject: [TP-C579556J] DMCA / Breach of Copyright From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C579556J] DMCA / Breach of Copyright Reference: [TP-C579556J] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. DMCA / Breach of Copyright Added by system at Wednesday, Aug 23 2006 08:52 am X-MailFrom: info@world-guides.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.180] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Wed Aug 23 08:48:34 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 23 Aug 2006 08:48:34 -0500 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@world-guides.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GFt5u-0009pe-At for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Wed, 23 Aug 2006 08:48:34 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 23 Aug 2006 08:48:32 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@world-guides.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GFt5s-00011t-At; Wed, 23 Aug 2006 08:48:32 -0500 Received: from moutng.kundenserver.de ([212.227.126.186]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from info@world-guides.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1GFt5q-0009oZ-Kp; Wed, 23 Aug 2006 08:48:31 -0500 Received: from [81.107.218.61] (helo=[192.168.0.2]) by mrelayeu.kundenserver.de (node=mrelayeu1) with ESMTP (Nemesis), id 0MKwpI-1GFt5n0CMl-0003J7; Wed, 23 Aug 2006 15:48:27 +0200 Mime-Version: 1.0 (Apple Message framework v752.2) To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com, copyright@theplanet.com Message-Id: <53EBF863-C55A-4869-9045-A0390AA8FDD6@world-guides.com> Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=Apple-Mail-17--207400391 From: World Guides Subject: DMCA / Breach of Copyright Date: Wed, 23 Aug 2006 14:49:02 +0100 X-Mailer: Apple Mail (2.752.2) X-Provags-ID: kundenserver.de abuse@kundenserver.de login:fa083ced01784c217b428b1b3203cfeb Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 212.227.126.186 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of world-guides.com) client-ip=212.227.126.186; envelope-from=info@world-guides.com; helo=moutng.kundenserver.de; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 Aug 2006 13:48:32.0542 (UTC) FILETIME=[D28EABE0:01C6C6BA] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel, Unfortunately, your client http://www.stictravel.com are breaching the copyright of our site World Guide to Berlin, http:// www.berlin.world-guides.com. We have contacted them directly on several occasions, but have never received a response to our correspondence. Therefore, we issued a DMCA complaint to the webhost Pugmarks, http:// www.pugmarks.net. Pugmarks did reply to our correspondence, but only to inform us that they could do nothing to help. As the Registrar for the site http://www.stictravel.com please could you advise how to proceed with launching a complaint as we wish to file the DMCA with yourselves as a breach of your Acceptable Use Policy, http://theplanet.com/legal/index.html. We greatly appreciate your help in this matter and understand fully that you do not condone the actions of your client http:// www.stictravel.com. Thanks once again and we look forward to hearing from you shortly. Regards, Martin WORLD GUIDES ------------------------- DMCA complaint; 1. MR. MARTIN TREASURE 2.The text copied is as follows: http://www.stictravel.com/packages/outbound/berlin.asp 3. The original text can be viewed here: http://www.berlin.world-guides.com 4. Contact: Martin Treasure - director TravelSmart Ltd Tel: +44 1373 454064 Email: info@world-guides.com Address: 18 Wayside Close, Frome, Somerset, England BA11 2DL 5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by World Guides. 6. I hereby state under penalty of perjury that this information is accurate, and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the infringed materials. Many thanks for your help, please advise if you require any further information. I look forward to hearing from you shortly. MARTIN MIME element (text/html)
Andrea Almeida, Associate General Counsel,

Unfortunately, your client
